about_the_game:
With the Lifetime Premium Pack you receive the All Access Lifetime Premium Pass which grants permanent access to all current and future premium pictures.

Your lifetime Premium Pack contains:
  • Access Premium pictures
  • x2 Stars Booster
  • 200,000 Stars
  • 100 Hints
